 2000-10252000-06-210,  ,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
PrecisOrder directing that a review be undertaken of the investment by KOCH INTERNATIONAL INC. of Scarborough, Ontario, whereby it became involved in the production, distribution and sale of VHS video recordings and DVDs, operating under the name Koch International Inc., at Scarborough, Ontario.
